snippet.title: Hidden Nightmares Trailer #1 (Official)
snippet.description:
About The Game: 
Hidden Nightmares is a horror experience set inside the endless nightmares of a psychiatric patient.
How would you behave if your psychiatric disorder continues to keep you stuck inside endless nightmares and you begin to feel that someone demonic is slowly taking control of your mind? Have fun going back and forth from the dream world to the real world, but take a good look at the world around you-something may have changed and may no longer be as you left it the last time you fell asleep.
Hidden Nightmares is just a horror experience built in an attempt to bring within a video game the feelings felt within the nightmares we experience on a daily basis. Waking up will not be so easy anymore, especially if someone has invaded your dreams by force.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2519450/Hidden_Nightmares/

Developer: WE2 Studios
Publisher: WE2 Studios

RECOMMENDED:
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS: Windows 10
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600k
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
Storage: 2 GB available space
